home.about: My journey began as a self-taught programmer, and since then, I’ve been learning and growing through various projects, with a special focus on Frontend Development. Over time, I’ve expanded into Full-Stack Development and am now deepening my skills in backend technologies and cloud services. Driven by continuous learning and a curiosity for new technologies, I’m always looking for opportunities to take on new challenges and grow as a developer.
